website_summaries.verdict: A lot of sponges for the price. If you want to save money, these are the makeup blenders to get.
pros: 100 latex-free foam sponges – the top value
Soft texture is ideal for blending a variety of makeup, creams, and other cosmetics
cons: A few sponges may arrive misshaped
Tend to soak up a lot of liquid makeup
Isn't as contoured as more pricey competitors

customer_reviews.title: I don't use these for make up, but I use them for nail polish application.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. I wanted these not for make up but for nail polish application. (Yo, to any simplynailogical watchers from YouTube). These came nicely packaged, and clean. I was a little worried from some of the feedback, but it was all just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: Terribly disappointing and misleading too. Misleading in that these are "seconds" -- imperfect. They are definitely usable but each one has a dent or twist or crease. Every one. Plus packaging is very annoying; they are all jumbled in one big bag taking up much more space than a usual pkg where they are all stacked neatly. This is a large jumbled mass and the bag, unlike usual bags of these sponges, must be cut open and doesn't reclose. Cheap, stiff, big heavy plastic jumbled bag of sponges, each with its own imperfection. Spend more for the readily available 32 pack and avoid this cheaper, deceptively described and unwieldy pkg of seconds. Yuk. I got taken.
customer_reviews.author: RLR

customer_reviews.title: Too squishy and bunch up under my fingers when attempting to use them to apply makeup...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these over a year ago, and they were exactly what I was looking for to apply foundation makeup. I am almost out, and reordered the exact same foam wedges, from the same seller. This time, they are completely different -- and completely unusable. They are squishy and bunch up under my fingers when attempting to use them to apply makeup. Since I'd ordered these before, I didn't take the time to read the recent reviews. Guess this has taught me a good lesson. I hope my review will help others - note that this product is NOT returnable!
customer_reviews.author: HorseLover

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my under eye along with my Sasha butter ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my under eye along with my Sasha butter cup powder. They give it a smooth look and cover my puffy dark circles completely
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Tried several different sponges, these are best by far.
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different foam make up sponges for applying foundation and BB cream. These worked best by far. Especially if I get them just a little damp first, the product goes along way and not so much of soaks into the sponge. I really like these better than any other sponges I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit price! And way better than dollar store sponges, too, for not much more money.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are better than the ones at the dollar store, and you get a giant bagful for a nice, low price. I’m always suspicious of most dollar store items (they often smell odd; I worry about lead in products from China), and since this is a whole lotta sponges for a very low price, I’ll buy t use from now on. They don’t smell, so they don’t make me nervous using ‘em in my face. And because the price is so low, I use ‘em in craft projects, too, mostly applying paint and powders. They work great for that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Binky Melnik

customer_reviews.title: Wedges too small to reuse.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed with this product. While many in a package and very soft, each piece was a tad too small limiting the number of times you can use to apply liquid foundation. Will use up but not buy again for prefer more reusable option.
customer_reviews.author: Happymom

customer_reviews.title: Wiping of excess oil paints on paintings....it works great!
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I've used a pencil stick that had a dense rubber-sponge on the end. The few I own are getting old and I was looking for a replacement since they no longer sell them. I decided to try the sponge wedges and they worked great! It helps perfect a straight line while painting. I can also tab off excess paint to give a soft layer of colour. I like the size dimension for handling, I also like the angles and corners.
customer_reviews.author: T.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for blending concealer and foundation
customer_reviews.text: These are great little makeup sponges. Soft, solid an perfect for blending in foundation. They aren't grainy at all. really nice sponges- I'd say much better then the Walmart brand of sponge. Will be buying again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DamnTheTorpedoesTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: Not too great.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the wedges in the bag came in deformed and not the shape they were supposed to be. Also they are almost too spongy (like playdoe) so when you hold them or try to apply makeup they squish in your fingers. Somewhat disappointed because the reviews were a lot better, maybe my bag was just a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a few weeks ago and I still have so many! I like the packaging and the use of the zip loc bag to put the wedges in. They are very convenient and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: these are quite good! I compared them to ones that are from ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, these are quite good! I compared them to ones that are from a cosmetic brand, and these are actually softer! It is true that many of them in the bag are actually deformed (I'm guessing from packaging or storage method), but I really don't care about that, since that doesn't affect their usage. I would buy these again when I run out of them.
customer_reviews.author: YCL

customer_reviews.title: Atrocious nail art
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely atrocious for nail art. Polish either doesn’t transfer or gets soaked back up when you try to lightly dab it to build up the gradient.
customer_reviews.author: Annsley Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Love them as long as you don’t mind misshaped
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t perfect to look at, but they are the best I have found for application. They don’t fall apart, firm and easy to use. They are misshapen, if you don’t mind that then I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Count what they deliver
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered in an undamaged box but the package inside was open and only had 47 sponges rather than 100. It's not eligible for return and I couldn't find a way to contact the seller easily enough to request a refund. I wouldn't order again.
customer_reviews.author: SAL DELOREAN

customer_reviews.title: Life Hack of the Week! Yea! 100 Sponges!
customer_reviews.text: Life hack of the week! So tired of washing makeup sponges and running out of clean ones at the most inconvenient time. This bag of 100 ought to solve that little problem. Product seems to be very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: andrea shepard

customer_reviews.title: Use these for daily makeup application
customer_reviews.text: These will easily last me a year. I use the same sponge for about a week or two, then instead of worrying about germs I just toss and use a new one. They’re not as sturdy as the more expensive ones but the trade off is that they’re cheap and disposable.
customer_reviews.author: rbc8807

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my face cream.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to put on a very expensive face cream. I just gave my daughter part of the 100 as I dont think I'll need that many. She was happy to get them. I will order more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MamaCass

customer_reviews.title: Worth my money!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love these! They are so soft on my face and they are the perfect size to use. They are also totally inexpensive and I was not expecting that the bag was so big! It was such a pleasant surprise! They are like a cheap beauty blender and I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not great
customer_reviews.text: They do their job, but they aren't as soft or nice to use as ones that I've gotten at other places. Good value for the money though!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened in the box, all of them squished
customer_reviews.text: I am not using an item for cosmetic purposes that has been opened before even arriving. This is shameful. (There was another product in the box, which is why it's so big for just a few sponges)
customer_reviews.author: Maki

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great, high quality sponges. They work just fine for applying daily makeup. Inexpensive enough to use a few times and toss. Good for keeping a really clean product area.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great for glitter nail polish application! Super soft/dense and in great condition!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for nail polish application, it makes glitter polish actually have a lot of glitter on the nail. Definitely worked! A couple sponges were sorta creased, but that's what happens when you buy a lot of soft sponges in a bag. They're very soft and dense so I'm sure they'd be great for makeup application as well! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Miya Wright

customer_reviews.title: They work fine; the packaging is real cheap and gross
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was pretty unattractive. Made me feel gross to use the contents.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Dirty, black, sponges
customer_reviews.text: Received them today and a good many are black and dirty looking... Not hygienic at all!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted triangle sponges. I got triangle sponges. No complaints. We use them for on-camera personality powdering and travel with them a bunch. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived opened, with the sponges everywhere and they stunk like chemicals. Or melted plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great for nail designs
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t need these for make up so not sure if they’re any good for that; I’d use a beauty blender instead. Anyway I needed this for nail designs! They work great for ombré on apres nails and other designs!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works great for nail gradients.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sponges I got we're really good. Some people said that they were a little low quality. Mine were wonderful. I use them for nail gradients not make up though.
customer_reviews.author: Jaucilynn

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I'd like, but that was my fault for not buying a bigger size. There are some complaints about the smell and packaging - my order arrived on time, the bag the wedges were in was flimsy, but held together. There is a slight smell to the wedges, but nothing off-putting. Great product for one time use! I'd buy again in a bigger size. :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rafeedie

customer_reviews.title: Quantity is great, but absorbs too much water
customer_reviews.text: These sponges are ok but I use them to mottle my reborn babies and they absorb way too much water which makes them not ideal for what I need them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Floriculture Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to you use
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. WHY DO THEY HAVE TO DISCOUNTINUED THE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelta D Blake

customer_reviews.title: Not good for nails
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for nails and didn't work well. It absorbed all the nail polish and didn't blend well when applied to my nail. I gave them away to a friend who does makeup and will give them a better use.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She is finding them quite useful - and not just for facial things. She is an artist, and uses them there, too, occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey F. ArnoldTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. They are extremely small and that makes it necessary to use multiple sponges and waste expensive foundation. Spend a little more and get quality, normal or large sized sponges.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good sponge. Not too soft. Good firmness to hold product so its not flimsy. A little smaller than most sponges but not overly small that its useless. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential sponges for make-up
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with a plethora of disposable make-up sponges. Quality sponges necessary for a sanitary make-up experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie J

customer_reviews.title: Nice, though small.
customer_reviews.text: These work quite well for spreading make u but I deleted one star because they are quite a bit smaller than I expected. Luckily, there are so many of them that it doesn't matter if their size makes me go through them more quickly than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pearlh

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I haven’t written a review earlier as this is probably my fourth time reordering these. Their soft and great for blending out makeup. Plus, I don’t have to worry about cleaning them. They’re the only makeup applicators I use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This us a nice product as I use it for stencilling acrylics
customer_reviews.author: Book and Movie Lover

customer_reviews.title: Ditch your nasty Beauty Blender lol
customer_reviews.text: Love using these instead of exorbitantly priced Beauty Blenders to apply my foundation. And these are disposable, cheap, and far more sanitary. Checkout youtube videos of Beauty Blenders that have been sliced in half after having been used and then "cleaned." You'll be disgusted at how much product is caked inside all the way to the middle. Ew!!! You cannot beat getting 100 beauty wedges for $10 bucks. They are soft and buff foundation onto the skin beautifully. I love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Wedges I've Found.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cosmetic wedges I have found so far! I am very picky with my cosmetic application products. They work great. Good sized and the application is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Immel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to do. Great for my clients
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect. I bought these to use while oil painting ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I bought these to use while oil painting and they work perfect for that. My friend tried one with her makeup and she really liked it as well. The quality is very high.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa FLer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find these in a store any where. This was 3x the size of packet I got last time I did get em in the store.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaD

customer_reviews.title: Missing 6 sponges (94/100)
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. My only issue is that when I opened the box, the bag of sponges was opened at the side seam and missing 6 sponges (and yes I counted them). I have 94 of the 100 sponges.
customer_reviews.author: Des Taylor

customer_reviews.title: works great for nail art!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for sponging polish on my nails for ombre effects and over stencils. They work great for that. This bag will last me forever, but when I need to, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Schwobel

customer_reviews.title: Great wedges.
customer_reviews.text: Great, great quality. I'm not even using them for makeup, I just want to do my nails with them. Other wedges had s*** reviews about super stinky sponges etc.... and these are just perfect. Really great. Sometimes I just rub them on my face because they're so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in good shape, but they're tiny. They're not the standard size you'd find in most beauty supply or pharmacy stores.
customer_reviews.author: Maiz_Maiz

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff and hard to work with
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some nice sponges for my make up kit these are very stiff and very hard to use
customer_reviews.author: Christian Milsom

customer_reviews.title: Latex Free!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found these latex free sponges for applying makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy on my sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only make-up sponges that I've ever used, I can use each sponge about a week before needing another. Soft and easy on my sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Awed One

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 100 of these; it'll take me a while to use them all. Really easy to use for doing gradient nails.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Kim

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: I basically bought these because the price per sponge is much cheaper than you could get pretty much anywhere else. They just also happen to be great sponges that apply makeup well. I used these sponges to apply cream makeup for a Halloween look and they blended the makeup flawlessly. It's also great that they are latex free so you don't have to worry about a client being allergic to latex.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price
customer_reviews.text: These work very nice to apply moisturizer and foundations. Works well around the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: RENAE

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Used these foam wedges on a film shoot. Good value, good price!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lowe

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: The wedges are a little small, but they work very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nail art
customer_reviews.text: I use these for nail art and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Small and stiff
customer_reviews.text: The sponges were much smaller than what I had anticipated and they are stiff. They will be going in the trash. No issues with the seller, item arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear much makeup, but bought these because I do work with a few drama groups and these came in handy to apply face make-up and black face paint for some of our dramas. Big enough to handle easily and apply evenly. I have a latex allergy, so having latex-free product was essential.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great for Blending
customer_reviews.text: I usually get something like this from walmart. But the amount for the price is something you can't beat. Great quality for blending foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Kadie Asbury

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as daughter has a latex allergy and will certainly be ordering again. Used by all members of the family for make-up, face painting and other miscellaneous things.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for makeup applicators these are the ones. Great disposable sponges to use everyday. Easy to apply foundation. Not to mention affordable!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great to apply paint and product to doll kits.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be way to small. Most makeup wedge sponges seem to come in a standard size. At half the typical thickness, I found these to be too flimsy to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: 90% of them came like this . If I could give it 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Lady Balbuena

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sponge!
customer_reviews.text: I use these sponges to do foundation applications and to smooth out concealer, etc. They are a great sponge for the price and having a whole bag of them is really useful. They are also great if you use them slightly damp to blend makeup or mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for foundation and makeup application
customer_reviews.text: Love these for makeup application! What a great price for so many.
customer_reviews.author: kmarie83

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These came in just fine. I prefer them more than some drug store brands.
customer_reviews.author: Bcalr

customer_reviews.title: Great wedges at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Love these sponges. They are firm enough that they don’t absorb too much makeup. I did not have dented wedges like others have reported. I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good price for so many.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fine product for the value. Not as soft as some I have used though.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: These are soft and cheap and plenitful. I use them for applying foundation and since doing that (instead of using my fingers) no more acne! whooo hoooo.... take my tip to heart teens!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but a little smaller than what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: h_paszkowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this as paint applicator when doing crafts. Works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: pislang

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than normal
customer_reviews.text: These sponges are adequate, but they are smaller than the cosmetic sponges you typically buy in a drugstore. I will probably not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry Artist

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: The foam wedges are dirty, and have dust and human hair attached to them. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Attanasio

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great sponges for a great price, recommend for any mua or person in need.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda King

customer_reviews.title: Great for applying foundation on large groups
customer_reviews.text: Great for applying foundation on large groups, especially on very dry skin I love slightly dampening these and using these to pat my foundation into skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad product
customer_reviews.text: The bag was already open inside the delivery package & half of the wedges were brown & dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Yareli

customer_reviews.title: I really like the feel of the sponges
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of the sponges. The work great for applying my make up primer as well as blending my concealer. For the price they're good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jania

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price though
customer_reviews.text: They do expand in water. Great for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: ncwriter

customer_reviews.title: The price is amazing but the only thing I would say about it ...
customer_reviews.text: The price is amazing but the only thing I would say about it is that sometimes when I'm applying my makeup I can feel parts of it start to come off on my face. However, they are so convenient because they come with so many, and I don't see any other problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Wang

customer_reviews.title: Better than Wal-mart or any pharmcy wedges!
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expecting... Will not buy anywhere else again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Scott

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They weren't very firm and too small to apply like I'd like
customer_reviews.author: Darshun

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: sponges came dented and scratch. got them a nail art. i would just stick to makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. World's as advertised. Don't wash your makeup sponges anymore, this is totally more hygienic.
customer_reviews.author: Roni C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I use these just to clean up makeup mistakes but not really for applying foundation. I used to use sponges for that. Now I use makeup brushes. The brushes work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: SET2011

customer_reviews.title: Make up sponges are pretty much the
customer_reviews.text: These are OK. Make up sponges are pretty much the same
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: These were purchased in bulk for a high school production ...
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased in bulk for a high school production make up crew and performed very well. We will likely be purchasing more for the next show.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie T.

customer_reviews.title: They work, but are small
customer_reviews.text: These foam wedges are smaller than the wedges I have always used. They are soft and do the job, but are a little more difficult to handle because of their size.
customer_reviews.author: Ageless

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cheap for the amount of wedges you get, work easily, very soft. Cons: They don't wash off easily, and if using for nail art, it takes off the bottom coat more often than not.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Black streaks
customer_reviews.text: Black streaks come off the sponge and onto your face. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: ryan joseph long

customer_reviews.title: otherwise work perfect.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little smaller then expected, otherwise work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: vpetrinski

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy material, many are squished and bent. All 100 in one bag. Seems to just move foundation around, doesn't blend well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelleymae

customer_reviews.title: Nice for foundation
customer_reviews.text: Great for foundation. Use a fresh one daily. Run under water first.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sponges, they take up a bit of makeup but not much, and they're great for blending.
customer_reviews.author: M&Em Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Not the same material as the ones I'm used to. Seems to absorb and wast a little more of my foundation but applies well. Good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I needed and they have no odor like some brands do. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: ABC123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and dosent' feel like plastic. Have bought more expensive pads but these are better
customer_reviews.author: vmm

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value, are TRULY latex free and are a great value! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GoodPeople

product_meta.title: FantaSea Latex Free Foam Wedges, 100-count/ Bag, 1-Pack
product_meta.description: Size:One Size* Latex Free Foam Wedges are great for applying makeup or removing excess makeup for a flawless look * 100 pc. Per bag * Disposable
feature_bullets: 100 latex free foam wedges per bag
